conflictDescription: The developer wants ALFRED to enforce consent policies automatically without asking users, which may include automatic listening or processing. The older adult wants to control when ALFRED listens by pressing a button, to prevent unwanted use. These goals conflict on how ALFRED listens and processes data.

userStoryASummary: As a developer, I want ALFRED to enforce consent policies automatically to keep caregiver workflows secure without asking users.
userStoryBSummary: As an older adult, I want ALFRED to respond only when I press the talk button, so I control when it listens and feel safe from unwanted use.
